text: @nowthisnews @gtconway3d @realDonaldTrump is trying to make money on an unproven drug for Coronavirus or prevention of COVID19.  How will you know it's working? If you don't get COVID doesn't mean Hydroxychlorqine was the answer. I believe he's lying.
